src/extraction/types.ts.description: Extraction pipeline types file with ExtractionStage (union type), StageConfidence, ConfidenceHint, HintSeverity, ExtractedCell, and ExtractionResult interfaces. All confidence-related types are here.

src/app/components/ui/ConfidenceSummary..description: Composite component combining ConfidenceIndicator and ConfidenceHintsList in a card layout. Features: expandable/collapsible hints section with LayoutAnimation, warning count badge, 'No warnings' state with checkmark, full accessibility support. Uses the same styling patterns as sibling components.

src/app/screens/ExtractionResultScreen.t.description: New ExtractionResultScreen component for displaying extraction results with puzzle grid preview, confidence summary, stage breakdown toggle, and Accept/Retry actions. Navigates to Solve screen when accepted.
